Screenshots do not match url. Also pictures are out of order. Please disable user filter (not reproduced https://www.google.com.mx/search?q=aidas+grand+court+base&uact=5 )
Please resubmit with correct url and picture.

issue.title: Google Play: com.nis.app
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nis.app](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.nis.app) ### Comment > I use the Inshorts app for catching up on news regularly. This app used to work properly. But it stopped working properly after I upgraded from AdGuard 3.x to AdGuard 4.x > > The app has following issues when AdGuard is enabled: > > - Embedded videos don't play (or sometimes play after 3-5 minutes of waiting). They usually embed Youtube videos. > - The news (main) page doesn't load. Keep getting the "Couldn't fetch news. Please try again" error (screenshot). If I click on "Try Again" link 3-7 times, it eventually load even with AdGuard enabled. > - This app also has an embedded browser shows news articles from news sources. That also doesn't load properly. Username: `@shriganesh` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/r4imwuw9xes4wscs4koowosks4coowex6o0f4yi40s.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gqysc4balgggs8s80wo08csgg8gs8scg7e7eze1z08.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.3.1 System version: | Android 13, Android 14 Browser: | It's an app, not a browser. License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `Cloudflare`, `DoH`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances,
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist Userscripts: | disabled Other extensions used: | No other adblockers or antivirus were installed in the phones

comment.body: Screenshots are safe for work and don't have any explicit content. Not sure how it got tagged as NSFW.
